constituent: vie, vase, stand up, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs, vase2, stand up2, elder brother2, teenager2, mouth2, human legs2
heisigStory: Two teenagers are seen here standing up to one another, vying for the attention of their peers.
koohiiStory1: TWO twin BROTHERS are competing (VYING) for the title of who is the older BROTHER. The game is that they must balance a VASE on their head and the one who drops his looses and becomes the younger BROTHER!
koohiiStory2: Two crazy brothers vying for the guiness records books of stupidity by trying to stand on their heads the longest.
myStory: cạnh tranh. thi thố. hai người a trai đứng oánh nhau
readingExamples: 競争 (きょうそう), 競技 (きょうぎ), 競泳 (きょうえい), 競う (きそ.う), 競る (せ.る)
